Job Title: Software Developer (Freelance Work) with Startup in Janakpuri

Degrees in the following subjects should be highlighted as particularly advantageous:Computer ScienceComputer Software EngineeringSoftware Programming and DevelopmentEngineeringAs well as formal qualifications, a Software Developer job description should highlight the following qualities:Knowledge and interest in computer systems and the latest technologiesThe ability to learn new technologies quicklyAn analytical mindCommercial and business awarenessGood communication skills both written and verbalAttention to detail and desire to probe further into data
